text: Arogya Niketan is a 1953 Indian Bengali novel written by Tarasankar Bandyopadhyay. In 1955 for this novel, Bandyopadhyay received Rabindra Puraskar and in 1956 he received Sahitya Akademi Award (Bengali). In 1967, this novel was picturised by director Bijoy Bose as Arogya Niketan. The novel was translated into Gujarati by Ramnik Meghani. == See also == * List of Sahitya Akademi Award winners for Bengali == References == Category:1953 novels Category:Bengali-language novels Category:Sahitya Akademi Award-winning works
